    • Method Detail

      • getWordsList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getWordsList()
        Get list of splits words.
        Returns:
        list of splits words.

      • sentencesSplit

        public void sentencesSplit(java.lang.String inputSentence,
                           int sentenceIndex)
        Split sentences in words and punctuation marks and write it in array list "wordsList".
        Parameters:
        inputSentence - the array list of sentences to be split.
        sentenceIndex - index of the sentence to be split.

      • isWordInSentence

        public boolean isWordInSentence(int sentenceIndex,
                                java.lang.String word)
        Find out if the sentence contains the specified word. Word searches occur in sentence by index.
        Parameters:
        sentenceIndex - index of sentence in which search the word.
        word - specified word.
        Returns:
        true when sentence have specified word.

      • isWordInAnotherSentences

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> isWordInAnotherSentences()
        Find out if another sentences contain the words from first sentence. Word searches occur in all sentences exclude the sentence, from that is a word.
        Returns:
        ArrayList which include true-answers when one from another sentences have words and false-answers when don't have.

      • swapWordsInExclamatorySentences

        public void swapWordsInExclamatorySentences(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inputSentences)
        Swap 2 words in all exclamatory sentences.
        Parameters:
        inputSentences - the array list of sentences words of which to be swapped.

      • deleteTheLongestSubstring

        public void deleteTheLongestSubstring(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inputSentences,
                                      char letter1,
                                      char letter2)
        Delete the longest substring from all declarative sentences.
        Parameters:
        inputSentences - the array list of sentences to be delete the longest substring.
        letter1 - the first letter from which will be delete the substring.
        letter2 - the last letter to which will be delete the substring.

      • sentenceFromWords

        public void sentenceFromWords(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inputSentences,
                              int sentenceIndex)
        Make from words a sentence and write this sentence in list of sentences.
        Parameters:
        inputSentences - the array list of sentences which sentence to be overwritten.
        sentenceIndex - index of sentence which to be overwritten.
